design.approval_note: Concrete design with Go structs, exported BuildGraph for reuse in buildState, adapter function for shape compat, specs endpoints with orphan detection, SpecsView component. All signatures specified.

discovery.approval_note: Clear picture: graph API exists but unused (hardcoded null), type mismatches (name/title, from-to/source-target), specs endpoints are stubs. TraceView has SVG renderer ready — just needs real data.

goal.approval_note: 5 clear outcomes: wire graph, add to buildState, implement specs endpoint, build specs viewer, real-time updates.

implement.approval_note: 5 tasks done across 3 waves. Both backend workers (graph types, specs endpoints) and frontend workers (adapter/wiring, specs viewer) completed. Integrator confirmed clean builds, no conflicts.

planning.approval_note: 5 tasks, 3 waves. Backend parallel (graph types + specs endpoint), frontend parallel (adapter/wiring + specs viewer), then integrator. Clean file boundaries.

requirements.approval_note: 6 REQs with clear acceptance criteria and file boundaries. Graph needs type alignment (Go→TS), specs endpoints need real implementation. 2 new files, 8 modified.

validate.approval_note: Tester already verified all 6 REQs against code in verify stage. All confirmed met.

verify.approval_note: 3 personas: reviewer, security, tester. All pass. Go 11/11 tests, TS clean, all 6 REQs verified, no security issues, edge cases covered in adapters and specs view.
